context: Hi, what movies do you like?
Hi I like action, comedy, and click flicks
Did you see Avengers: Infinity War (2018) or Deadpool 2 (2018) recently?
I havent seen Deadpool 2 (2018) but I have seen Deadpool (2016) The first one was hilarious. So I am sure the second one will be too!
resp: Yeah! Game Night (2018) was a good action/comedy movie this year.
